NumSegments.label: Number of Pieces
NumSegments.description: Number of pieces you will need to print and assemble to create the full drum shell.

ShellThick.label: Shell thickness
ShellThick.description: Thickness of the drum shell wall.

ShellHeight.label: Shell height
ShellHeight.description: Total height of the drum shell from bottom to the peak of the bearing edge.

ShellDiam.label: Shell diameter
ShellDiam.description: Outer diameter of the drum shell, determining the overall size.

LugTopDist.label: Lug offset from top
LugTopDist.description: Distance from the peak of the bearing edge to the center of the first lug mounting hole.

LugSpacing.label: Lug spacing
LugSpacing.description: Vertical spacing between lug mounting holes.

LapSizePercent.label: Lap size (%)
LapSizePercent.description: Size of the lap joint as a percentage of the shell piece angle.

LugHoleDiam.label: Lug hole diameter
LugHoleDiam.description: Diameter of the holes for mounting tension lugs to the shell.
